text: Angelo Scola (; born 7 November 1941) is an Italian Cardinal of the Catholic Church, philosopher and theologian. He was Archbishop of Milan from 2011 to 2017. He was Patriarch of Venice from 2002 to 2011. He has been a cardinal since 2003 and a bishop since 1991. Scola was born in Malgrate, Kingdom of Italy. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Italian cardinals Category:Italian philosophers Category:Italian theologians Category:Writers from Milan
title: Angelo Scola
